Scriptal.Name: Print Table
Scriptal.Description: Prints the contents of a table as an in-game, white-text notification.
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: local tempStringTable = {} for index, value in ipairs(|[1|TABLE]|) do tempStringTable[index] = tostring(value) end InfCore.DebugPrint(table.concat(tempStringTable))

Choice.Name: Table
Choice.Description: The index-based table that will be concatenated into a notification.
